title: ISic000784. I.Sicily inscription 000784
body:
Facsimile Images

|a 1DM[..]
2VIBIAARETEVIX[.......]
3XXX |b
4VIBIUSAPTITIANPI[..?....?]

Apparatus criticus

  • Korhonen 2004

English translation

Sacred to the spirits of the underworld. Vibia Arete lived for 30 years; Vibius Aptitianus built this

commentary

bibliography

  • 1984.0442 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 143 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000028
  • Libertini 1931 49 no.5-6 = Libertini (1981) 99 no.5-6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001870
  • Manganaro 1961 183 no.1 ph https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001852
